languages.text:
Ее мечущийся взгляд выискивает мою крылатую фигуру. Гиперзрачки позволяют мне рассмотреть лицо Жертвы — я вижу, как ее взгляд внимательно изучает мое снаряжение.
Можно больше не скрываться, и я встаю в полный рост и издаю клекочущий боевой клич.
Пусть знает, что ее убьет.

Its frantic gaze is looking for my winged figure. The hyperpupils allow me to examine the Prey's face — I can see its eyes scrutinise my gear.
There is no need to hide anymore, so I stand up to my full height and emit a wailing battle cry.
Let the Prey know what will kill it.
languages.original_text:

Можно больше не скрываться, и я встаю в полный рост и издаю клекочущий боевой клич.
Пусть знает, что ее убьет.

languages.text:
その狂った視線が翼の生えた私の姿を探している。私の瞳孔は大きく広がり、獲物の顔が良く見える。私のギアをじっくりと観察しているようだ。
これ以上隠れていても意味はない。私は背筋を伸ばして立ち上がり、雄叫びをあげる。
獲物に、自分の命を奪う者の姿を見せつけてやる。
languages.original_text:
Its frantic gaze is looking for my winged figure. The hyperpupils allow me to examine the Prey's face — I can see its eyes scrutinise my gear.
There is no need to hide anymore, so I stand up to my full height and emit a wailing battle cry.
Let the Prey know what will kill it.

traits.locale_text:
その狂った視線が翼の生えた私の姿を探している。私の瞳孔は大きく広がり、獲物の顔が良く見える。私のギアをじっくりと観察しているようだ。
これ以上隠れていても意味はない。私は背筋を伸ばして立ち上がり、雄叫びをあげる。
獲物に、自分の命を奪う者の姿を見せつけてやる。
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text:
它疯狂的目光盯着我长着翅膀的身影。我瞪大了经过改造的眼睛，看着猎物的脸。看得出来，它的目光正在打量着我的装备。
没必要继续躲躲藏藏了，于是我站在地上，挺直了身子，发出了战斗的咆哮。
我得让猎物明白，是哪位猎手要了他的命。
languages.original_text:
Its frantic gaze is looking for my winged figure. The hyperpupils allow me to examine the Prey's face — I can see its eyes scrutinise my gear.
There is no need to hide anymore, so I stand up to my full height and emit a wailing battle cry.
Let the Prey know what will kill it.

没必要继续躲躲藏藏了，于是我站在地上，挺直了身子，发出了战斗的咆哮。

traits.speaker: Player

languages.text:
Su mirada frenética busca mi figura alada. Las hiperpupilas me permiten observar el rostro de la presa y veo que sus ojos examinan mi equipo.
Ya no hay necesidad de esconderse, de modo que me pongo en pie y emito un grito de batalla.
Que la presa sepa quién va a matarla.
languages.original_text:
Its frantic gaze is looking for my winged figure. The hyperpupils allow me to examine the Prey's face — I can see its eyes scrutinise my gear.
There is no need to hide anymore, so I stand up to my full height and emit a wailing battle cry.
Let the Prey know what will kill it.

traits.locale_text:

Ya no hay necesidad de esconderse, de modo que me pongo en pie y emito un grito de batalla.
Que la sepa quién va a matarla.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text:
Ihr panischer Blick sucht nach meiner geflügelten Gestalt. Die Hyperpupillen gestatten mir, das Gesicht der Beute zu studieren. Ich sehe Augen, die meine Ausrüstung mustern.
Es gibt keinen Grund mehr, sich zu verstecken, daher richte ich mich zu meiner vollen Größe auf und stoße einen heulenden Kampfschrei aus.
Die Beute soll wissen, was sie töten wird.
languages.original_text:
Its frantic gaze is looking for my winged figure. The hyperpupils allow me to examine the Prey's face — I can see its eyes scrutinise my gear.
There is no need to hide anymore, so I stand up to my full height and emit a wailing battle cry.
Let the Prey know what will kill it.

languages.text:
De son regard frénétique, la proie cherche ma silhouette ailée. Grâce aux hyperpupilles, j'examine son visage et peux voir qu'elle est à la recherche de mon équipement.
Inutile de continuer à me cacher. Je me lève de toute ma hauteur et rugis un cri de guerre.
Que la proie sache ce qui va la tuer.
languages.original_text:
Its frantic gaze is looking for my winged figure. The hyperpupils allow me to examine the Prey's face — I can see its eyes scrutinise my gear.
There is no need to hide anymore, so I stand up to my full height and emit a wailing battle cry.
Let the Prey know what will kill it.

languages.text:
Hummalı bakışlarla karşısındaki kanatlı surete bakıyor. Geliştirilmiş göz bebeklerim, Avımın yüzünü incelememe olanak tanıyor. Teçhizatımı kontrol ettiğini görebiliyorum. Artık gizlenmeme gerek yok, dimdik ayağa kalkıyorum ve bir savaş ağıdı koparıyorum.
Avım, onu neyin öldüreceğini bilsin.
languages.original_text:
Its frantic gaze is looking for my winged figure. The hyperpupils allow me to examine the Prey's face — I can see its eyes scrutinise my gear.
There is no need to hide anymore, so I stand up to my full height and emit a wailing battle cry.
Let the Prey know what will kill it.

traits.locale_text:
Hummalı bakışlarla karşısındaki kanatlı surete bakıyor. Geliştirilmiş göz bebeklerim, Av'ın yüzünü incelememe olanak tanıyor. Teçhizatımı kontrol ettiğini görebiliyorum. Artık gizlenmenin bir gereği yok, dimdik ayağa kalkıyorum ve bir savaş ağıdı koparıyorum.
Av onu neyin öldüreceğini bilsin.
traits.speaker: Player
